article_title: Cal Thomas: Confronting the immigration crisis
article_text:
How do you think the charges will affect Cosby’s legacy?

Story: Bill Cosby is ordered to stand trial in sex case

og.description: Back when I was in school, I performed a scientific experiment in which I poured a liquid of one color into a beaker that contained liquid of a different color. At first the liquid in the beaker was diluted, but as I kept pouring, the poured liquid eventually overtook the liquid in the beaker, creating an entirely new substance.
